alertsA.title: Success!
alertsA.message: This message will explain to the user what has been a success (completed form, successful login .etc)

alertsA.title: Please Note...
alertsA.message: There is something the user needs to take note of, this message will explain it to the user.

alertsA.title: Warning!
alertsA.message: This message will warn the user of an issue that requires their attention (unsaved application .etc)

alertsA.title: Sorry, there was an error...
alertsA.message: There was an error, such as a wrong username and password combination.
